SchedMD | Software Engineer | Lehi, Utah | ONSITE https://www.schedmd.com

SchedMD are the developers of the open-source Slurm resource manager (aka job scheduler) used by roughly half of the top500 systems.

We're looking for experienced Linux systems programmers and software support personnel to develop additional capabilities, build out a further CI/regression stack, and help our customers keep their clusters running at peak capacity.

Apply through the website (https://www.schedmd.com/careers.php), or email me directly at tim@schedmd.com .
